mapper.select:
select t.*,t1.material_name as materialName,t1.material_model as materialModel,t1.measure_unit as measureUnit,t1.brand from t_pss_material_stock t left join t_pss_material_mgt t1 on t.material_code = t1.material_code where 1=1
and t.material_code in
#{item}
order by t.id

select t.*,t1.material_model materialModel,t1.measure_unit measureUnit,t1.brand, IFNULL(A.quantityToIn,0) quantityToIn,IFNULL(A1.quantityIn,0) quantityIn, IFNULL(B.quantityToOut,0) quantityToOut,IFNULL(B1.quantityOut,0) quantityOut, t.quantity - IFNULL(B.quantityToOut,0) avlQuantity from t_pss_material_stock t LEFT JOIN t_pss_material_mgt t1 on t.material_code = t1.material_code LEFT JOIN ( select t1.material_code,sum(t1.quantity) quantityToIn from t_pss_order t left join t_pss_material_detail_log t1 on t.order_code = t1.foreign_code where t.`status` > '1' and t.`status` not in ( '4','7') and t.order_type = '1' and t1.material_code is not null group by t1.material_code ) A on t.material_code = A.material_code
LEFT JOIN ( select t1.material_code,sum(t1.quantity) quantityIn from t_pss_order t left join t_pss_material_detail_log t1 on t.order_code = t1.foreign_code where t.`status` = '7' and t.order_type = '1' and t1.material_code is not null group by t1.material_code ) A1 on t.material_code = A1.material_code
LEFT JOIN (
select t1.material_code,sum(t1.quantity) quantityToOut from t_pss_order t left join t_pss_material_detail_log t1 on t.order_code = t1.foreign_code where t.`status` > '1' and t.`status` not in ( '4','7') and t.order_type = '2' and t1.material_code is not null group by t1.material_code ) B on t.material_code = B.material_code
LEFT JOIN( select t1.material_code,sum(t1.quantity) quantityOut from t_pss_order t left join t_pss_material_detail_log t1 on t.order_code = t1.foreign_code where t.`status` = '7' and t.order_type = '2' and t1.material_code is not null group by t1.material_code ) B1 on t.material_code = B1.material_code
